jx get addons

jx create addon prometheus

jx get addons

helm ls

PROM_ADDR=$(kubectl -n jx get ing prometheus-server -o jsonpath="{.spec.rules[0].host}")

open "http://$PROM_ADDR"
  • Use admin as the username and password
jx create addon anchore
